Now you can see this changelog!
Everything has been written from scratch with Vue 3 (from Vue 2 to Vue 3)

Now you can use some emotes like :speedset: (or some emotes like :BOOBA:). Emotes can be used for: Tier List Name, Tier Row Name, Character comments and XY Graph axes!. A suggestion box will appear after you type ":" showing some of the matching emotes, press enter to input that emote.

Improvments to ther 'Apply filter to ranked elements': Now the items that don't match the filter or search query will not disappear but decrease their opacity so you can move items around without disabling the filter
Add support for full size hero images (_su.png). Patched html2canvas.js to correctly export this type of icons.
Fixed artifact icons not dispaying Role and Rarity icons.
Added "Add above" and "Add below" otions for quicker tier row creation in the "Tier Row Settings" modal.
You can now Save as PNG without including the title in the image. (You can enable this option in the settings menu)
When exporting as PNG you can now view a preview of the image (Zoom and move around). You can right click or click the download icon to the save the image!
Character skins now are available. You can select a skin by pressing right click on a character with ingame skins.
Added a shortcut to the E7Vault model viewer
Comments for tier elements are now available on mobile. Tap a character to view and edit comments.
Added CTRL+F shortcut for PC users. It will focus and select all of the text inside the search bar.
